    • Method Detail

      • login

        public static java.lang.String login(java.lang.String userName,
                     java.lang.String password)
                              throws LoginException
        Logs the user into ClaimCenter and returns the session ID of the service conversation.
        Parameters:
        userName - The user name to authenticate.
        password - The password to authenticate with.
        Returns:
        a valid session id.
        Throws:
        LoginException - if the user cannot be authenticated for some reason

      • login

        public static com.guidewire.pl.system.service.context.ServiceToken login(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                                                  throws LoginException
        Logs the user in and returns the service token.
        Parameters:
        request - Http request which serves as an authentication source
        Returns:
        service token for authorized user or null if a user is not valid.
        Throws:
        LoginException - if the user cannot be authenticated for some reason

      • logout

        public static void logout(java.lang.String sessionId)
        Logs the user out of the service conversation. The service session will timeout if this method is not called. Note that the parameter is no longer used.
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the conversation.
